unnormalised: Hey everyone! Athlete bios are my fav. Ever read about Milkha Singh? What an inspiration! Reminds me of "Bhaag Milkha Bhaag."
normalised: Hey everyone! Athlete bios are my favourite. Ever read about Milkha Singh? What an inspiration! Reminds me of "Bhaag Milkha Bhaag."

unnormalised: He trained so hard, running those kilometers. Or P.T. Usha's struggles at Payyoli Express. Even the Tata Football Academy has churned out some gems, no? I love reading about their journey, the initial Rs.500 sponsorship or tough times and how they overcame it. Amazing!
normalised: He trained so hard, running those kilometers. Or P. T. Usha's struggles at Payyoli Express. Even the Tata Football Academy has churned out some gems, no? I love reading about their journey, the initial rupee five hundred sponsorship or tough times and how they overcame it. Amazing!
